Text: Why the fuck can't we get all files to show up in list any more.

@DiabloTheCritic
TPB is using magnet links now. You don't actually download the torrent file from tpb. Magnet links tells your torrent client to download the .torrent file from a seed. Whats why you can't see the files before you start downloading the torrent

When the download starts, give it about 30 seccs then highlight 'files' near the bottom left if using u torrent then the files show in that torrent, right click the ones you don't want and choose 'don't download'
thanx VTV keep up your work
Hate the season enders, thanks for the up!
